name: Needhi Dhoker

about: A creative, result-driven professional equipped with a winner’s mindset and an expertise in content creation & marketing, capable of managing positions of a fashion content writer, social media marketer and a fashion stylist.

experience.title: Content Lead SEO - Ustudio x Hindustan Unilever
Fashion & Grooming Writer
experience.description: Working as a digital content writer specializing in fashion and grooming category for a men’s lifestyle magazine.Key Achievements:Deemed as one of the top writers within MensXP, having consistently achieved a record number of views (averaging 1.5 M+ per month) on articles featured on the company’s official website.Produced content for the company’s other inline brands such as MensXP Shop and MensXP Mud increasing brand value and sales for the company’s merchandise. Brainstormed on creative ideas for MensXP Fresh.Collaborated with PR managers and interviewed various celebrities, fashion designers, models, fashion stylists to source first-hand information and original content for the company. Whilst doing so, contributed in enhancing the company’s brand image and value.
experience.description_html: Working as a digital content writer specializing in fashion and grooming category for a men’s lifestyle magazine.Key Achievements:Deemed as one of the top writers within MensXP, having consistently achieved a record number of views (averaging 1.5 M+ per month) on articles featured on the company’s official website.Produced content for the company’s other inline brands such as MensXP Shop and MensXP Mud increasing brand value and sales for the company’s merchandise. Brainstormed on creative ideas for MensXP Fresh.Collaborated with PR managers and interviewed various celebrities, fashion designers, models, fashion stylists to source first-hand information and original content for the company. Whilst doing so, contributed in enhancing the company’s brand image and value.

experience.title: Senior Content Writer
experience.description: Managed website, blog, social media content and marketing for a women’s ethnic wear e-commerce brand.Key Achievements:Boosted social media follower count by over 150% through innovative content creation and active organic promotions and campaigns.Managed content and assisted in optimization of Google and Facebook paid-per-click ad campaigns and SEO.Client acquisitions, business promotion and business development though managed events, retail exhibitions and other offline marketing channels.
experience.description_html: Managed website, blog, social media content and marketing for a women’s ethnic wear e-commerce brand.Key Achievements:Boosted social media follower count by over 150% through innovative content creation and active organic promotions and campaigns.Managed content and assisted in optimization of Google and Facebook paid-per-click ad campaigns and SEO.Client acquisitions, business promotion and business development though managed events, retail exhibitions and other offline marketing channels.

experience.title: Fashion Content Specialist
experience.description: Managed blogs, banners and social media content for the fashion e-commerce company.Key Achievements:Created traction and boosted sales for the company’s e-commerce store through blogs, banners, product descriptions and collection copies.Increased social media following by over 100% by creating forward-thinking content and designs for all social media channels.
experience.description_html: Managed blogs, banners and social media content for the fashion e-commerce company.Key Achievements:Created traction and boosted sales for the company’s e-commerce store through blogs, banners, product descriptions and collection copies.Increased social media following by over 100% by creating forward-thinking content and designs for all social media channels. <!---->
